watch1.name: Premium Chronograph Watch
watch1.description: This premium chronograph watch features a stainless steel case, sapphire crystal, and precise Swiss movement. Water-resistant up to 100 meters, it's perfect for everyday wear or special occasions.

earbud1.name: Wireless Bluetooth Earbuds
earbud1.description: Experience crystal-clear audio with these premium wireless earbuds. Featuring noise cancellation technology, waterproof design, and a comfortable fit for all-day wear.
features: Up to 36 hours of battery life with charging case

bag1.name: Designer Leather Handbag
bag1.description: This elegant designer leather handbag combines style and functionality. Crafted from genuine leather with multiple compartments and adjustable straps for versatile carrying options.
features: Spacious main compartment with zippered closure

neckband1.name: Sports Neckband Earphones
neckband1.description: Designed for active lifestyles, these sports neckband earphones offer a secure fit and sweat-resistance. Perfect for workouts with deep bass sound and long battery life.
features: Up to 12 hours of battery life
Quick charge - 10 min for 2 hours playback
